name: GP Retro
description:
*** In the first 10 racing game in 18 countries! ***

go go GOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!
Start an exciting race! Run! Drifting! WIN!

Becoming the World Champion and driving legenadary pixel-cars!
A fast drive game inspired by the ARCADE GAME!


Details:

- Amazing gameplay!

- Over 25 different cars and funny drivers: F1, Sport Car, Ice cream truck, 500, the Mini and more

- Over 100 different races (per 18 tracks!): 10 opponents, time attack, Head to Head, Endurance...

- Special Games: knock down cones, Crush chickens!

- Online time attack challenge!

- World Championship Leaderboard online!

- Unlock the achievements!

- Select you controls: joypad, joysticks, or use your smartphone or tablet as a steering wheel!
